      • constructValidURIImpl

        protected String constructValidURIImpl(String directoryURI,
                                       String name)
                                throws Exception
        Description copied from class: FileOperations
        Returns the full path of a URI String that contains no invalid URI characters.
        This function creates a full path URI from the directory URI and filename, then converts it to a String object to eliminate invalid characters. Call this method instead of manually making a full path string argument to a FileOperations method.
        Fixes defect : Module names that contain illegal URI characters are not handled correctly.
        Specified by:
        constructValidURIImpl in class FileOperations
        Parameters:
        directoryURI - the directory containing the file to operate on
        name - the filename we are operating on
        Returns:
        a valid URI String containing the full path of the filename we are operating on
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getDirChecksumImpl

        protected String getDirChecksumImpl(String dirPath)
                             throws Exception
        Description copied from class: FileOperations
        Computes the checksum of the directory. A sorted recursive list of files will be generated for the given directory, and the md5 hash of that list will be returned by this function.
        Specified by:
        getDirChecksumImpl in class FileOperations
        Parameters:
        dirPath - Path of the directory for which the checksum needs to be computed.
        Returns:
        Checksum of the directory which is computed as described above.
        Throws:
        Exception
